iV9Ib7-AAdf_L7jhoVy_Kw.text: The staff was friendly, courtsey,helpful, the service was great the food was great hot I would recommend them for food this was my first time here I'll be going back for lunch again in the near future

f-6oae7TltlfJicUiZdC8Q.text: Had a hard time focusing on reading my book due to the rowdy crowd around!

LZTV7Xcm8h8ZNd7nB0-6rA.text: CK's is in our neighborhood and we have gone several times. It's pretty spacious, even when is full it doesn't  feels crowded. They have TV's everywhere. The patrons ranges from bikers to families to rabid sports fans.  The food is your typical sports bar food. The fries are pretty good, I've had wings, burgers, and they're OK. I don't know why, but my wings usually barely have any sauce on them. I'm sure though that I could have asked for extra sauce no problem.  The service has always been great, friendly and fast.  All in all I'll give them 3 stars for food and 5 for service.

wF7yNLjeiTijhRYdp8DVFQ.text: New to Phoenix from out of state.  Found the bar staff extremely nice (Heather) and talkative in welcoming a new patron.  Beer prices were "a bit" steep, but overall a great experience and good apps.  Took the family back for the Friday fish fry which was outstanding and as close to home (Wisconsin) as we have had in Phoenix.  We will continue to be regulars.

MgqFsOsKg_A0ueRv0y0nGQ.text: Since the husband and I have finally decided that we've exhausted our choices of restaurants in PHX (mostly due to me being so finicky) we have pushed our restaurant search a little further out of the city.  This search led us out to CK's Tavern and Grill.  My first impression was that this place was nuts!  There was a rather raucous crowd on the patio watching the Suns game, and everyone seemed to be having a great time.  Inside wasn't much different, with most tables being occupied, but a couple were quickly cleared off to make room for us.    We only sat down for a minute or so before our super efficient server came by.  I really like watching servers and seeing how they do their job, because frankly, there aren't very many good ones anymore.  This girl was awesome.  She didn't do one single thing without doing three others at the same time.  If she was bringing our drinks, she was also bringing the check for the table next to us and the drinks for the group on the other side.  She was awesome.  It actually seemed that most of the other servers did this too.  They must do some awesome training camps here or something.  Anyway, we each ordered a dozen wings, I got the honey and I tried the husband's raspberry chipotle.  We also got an order of beer fries just in case.  The fries were great and super crispy and we got a big fat side of ranch with it.  The wings were searingly hot and when I finally got to bite into them, they were pretty good.  The honey one's are literally just that, honey.  It was a nice alternative to the heavier stuff.  The raspberry chipotle sauce was pretty tasty, but not my favorite.  Meanwhile, after I ate most my wings, I decided I wanted more fries.  They were no longer hot, but surprisingly, they were still crispy and tasty.  Sweet.  We will most certainly come back here if we're in this part of town.  When you group a really fun atmosphere with a million TV's and awesome service, you definitely get my vote.

g52CCGtgrJriu77DijHUKA.text: We come here all the time because it is a good mix between sports bar and good place to bring the family for a fun dinner. They are typically fairly busy but we never have trouble getting a seat and it is a good place to catch a game. On nice days. we love the large outdoor patio. I do wish they had some light beers included in their beer specials, but the food is great and the drinks are priced right where they should be.

7V1zR-jLXmlstDCrXLahjw.text: Really disappointed that I wasted my time and money here. The restaurant was dingy and band too loud to hold a conversation. The wings were dry and bland, salad tasted like feet, beer tasted like soap and burger was undercooked. Server was very nice but don't think I'll be back here again.

yOGdfO94xwvBGSN-eeCb-w.text: Food was good, drinks are priced right and it is a great atmosphere for watching sports. I would recommend this place to anyone interested in a casual and fun time.

6Cwf3Tc0XQxEb75uZKS8gg.text: Stopped in for a drink while killing some time. Service at the bar was fast and friendly.  Didn't try the food, but if I was in the area, I would go back again.

zEcd6d9b5NPNMpIOBmjXNg.text: We thought we'd have a problem getting in on a busy Friday night. We were happily surprised to be seated immediately, and as soon as we were we had a waiter getting us a drink (great beer selections!). Our food order was taken and came out quickly, and was fantastic. They also have the on-line Buzztime trivia contest, so that was fun to pass the time. All in all, the service was fast/friendly/efficient, the food was great, prices reasonable, and beer selection excellent. We were first-timers, but we'll be back!

5OZL6BmICnbfxO9WTIdl8w.text: Went here on a first date last nite, we met on the internet, so I was a little nervous. The wait staff was super kind and the band was great! The whole vibe of this place really made me feel comfortable.

rlgwu67ulRTkCtaepCoU-Q.text: Service is always great and the waiters and waitresses are always super friendly. The boneless wings, raspberry, finished on the grill, with a side of hot sauce might sound crazy, but I'm telling you, no joke!!!

ozo-79m7xvCNHAdprrHnTQ.text: Every time I go there it seems to be about the same great atmosphere. Excellent service, cheerful wait staff, clean restrooms, tables and the selection in live music is awesome. I always recommend any of my friends to this place when we want to hang out, have a few drinks, eat or watch the bands. Only thing I would say is not that great is the parking. It's extremely tight and your car will get dinged.

Z7GYmXgt1Cq13aR2Andyhw.text: This place kicks serious ass.  We went on a Friday night and, while I expected it to be busy, I sure didn't expect this.  There were TONS of people here.  It seemed like everyone knew everyone else and that everyone was just there to have a good time.  There are easily a dozen tvs on the wall in the dining area.  They have tons of beers, arcade games, and pool tables.  There is a nice patio with tvs and the servers are great.  As for the food, I only tried the raspberry-chipotle wings and the beer fries but both were great.  They don't charge you for ranch and don't screw you by making you order a minimum number of wings in a certain flavor.  You could get a dozen wings in all the flavors if you wanted - now that's how it should be done.  I don't usually go to this part of town but this will definitely become my new hangout when I'm in the Tuk.

b1LRVUTf1fAnUFNnv8rw9g.text: Simply put.... Typical run of the mill bar food and service. Nothing special, but nothing bad either.

yNfzQxn9DWcQLrNO1w1jSQ.text: Best place to go to for wings booze and good times! Very friendly environment. Staff is amazing. The honey hot wings are so yummy with a side of bleu cheese and ranch. Food didn't dissapoint either..boneless wings were some of the best ever..lg portion, cooked to perfection. .not the soggy, overly breaded ones that everyone else serves..just naked, white meat chicken breast strips fried up with a tasty sauce...wife has a small chef salad..now she gets this all the time at other places and you would be surprised how many restaurants screw this up.....not here..everything was fresh and top quality.....can't wait to come back here and only wished we lived closer.....

SRCHxRzq5ik0xm4LTUmurg.text: We stopped in after the Cards game for a late dinner and drinks. The band was awesome but the food was far from good. Nachos were bland and boring. The Philly cheesesteak was decent but small. The food quality was below that of a Denny's type of place.

eARIFwOK_F1mKaX1xLpCLg.text: This bar is your typical neighborhood sports bar.  Decent food and good service will make you want to return. Large smoking porch with mist is nice if you are a smoker (I am not) The smell of cigarettes tends to drift into the bar.

pDvZuWbbYPHV16GAmnGjUw.text: Definitely the best bar to be at in Ahwatukee!  Anyone else been going here since the Famous Sam's, than Bar None days?  Once it became CK's many years back now the food menu took this place over the top!  Some of the best bar food in all of Arizona!  I always get the medium wings, only grilled and they are phenomenal!  My wife gets the chop chop salad and says it's amazing!

9zOH3LPgAUi_kcmLK17szg.text: Let me start this off saying the place is quite good for bar food, but it just is not to my tastes.  If there were 1/2 stars, I would rate it a 3.5.  I came here last night with the family and we had GREAT service from our waiter.  He was on top of everything except soda refills, but he was VERY busy.  He was excellent at providing recommendations and he was very friendly.  Top notch for this kind of joint (especially compared to Loco Patron, where servers can sometimes go missing for 15 minutes or longer).    We ordered several dishes.  Here's what I can remember: beer battered french fries with melted shredded cheese (sides of ranch and ketchup), three kinds of wings (mild - for grandma, hot and hot bbq (both grilled), salad, chicken fingers and tots for the kiddo (she didn't even touch them so I have no idea how she felt), Sierra Nevada pint for $2.50 and a glass of wine for Grandma.  The french fries were yum-o dipped in the ranch. The wings were good but... I am just not a fan of their crushed red pepper flakes.  Plus, my wings were charred black and I am just not into eating burnt wings.  I like the heat of the wings, though they were NOT really HOT to my palate.   The salad was covered in egg, so if you are into that sort of thing... go for it.  It was Grandma's and she liked it.  I just don't like egg on my salad.  Or cheese.  But that is me!  Overall, I think it is a decent place and the service definitely bumps it up.  Would I eat here again?  Well, maybe.  I would not go out of my way, but I would join someone if they were coming.  I appreciated the good service and that's why the 4 stars.  Service is a rarity in the so-called Service Industry.  Hopefully CKs pays their employees enough to entice them to stay!

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. 1/2 shrimp (4) 1/2 chicken basket (2) and buffalo fries.

BUq86pfGBkiTQK6n6C_-DA.text: I enjoy CKs.  It's a dive but it's a comfortable dive.  The food is decent, the live music is always enjoyable, and the daily specials are a staple.  The happy hour is 3-7 daily and there are reverse specials as well.

RrFY2KXUsjqsxYK77AFMQg.text: I like the Carne Adovada plate.  Really good and filling. Lots of draft beers.  Good to bring the kids.

W8YVsRIEz7_eVbP3oP06Pw.text: This is my favorite place to have a burger in Ahwatukee, I was very disappointed the other night that I went there . I ordered my burger well done and it was served  medium to raw. I told the waitress and she asked me if I wanted to make another order, um no...I want my original order the way I ordered it. I wish I could post a picture of it on here, a photo speaks volumes.

qw-m8wZJZWxLGJjlOE0Tew.text: After being a relatively regular patron for the last two years (visits at least once a week-don't judge!), I have finally decided to put my two cents in. There is a reason that CK's is the place we go when nothing else sounds good. Let me start by saying they have SO MANY tv's. Any sport you could imagine watching. Trivia (Buzztime). Nearly every televised NFL game. Now food. I would rate good 4/5. Better than five bar. By no means gourmet but absolutely edible and without complaint. All salads great (except they got rid of kale :(...). Burgers fairly  decent. Nachos awesome. Decent sandwiches. I mean it's a sports bar. So considering that, food is nothing to complain about. Awesome daily and happy hour special. Monday is San Tan night. Friday all you can eat fish--OMG. That's their BEST. What keeps us coming back is the AAAAMMMMAAAZZZIING beer selection. And the service. Katie is honestly the best server I have ever had. Sadly for all other servers at every establishment, they are all held to Katie standard. None have measured up. Rarely do any even come close. She honestly cares about interacting with her customers. A keeper-although I hope she goes on to rule the world for her sake. Anyway, she knows exactly what we want and when we want it and it took her a grand total of once to learn it. Juleesa is a close second as is Kelsey. And honestly, in all our visits, we have had half a visit with less than acceptable service and never have seen that server there since. Live music weekends although the type they play is not really our thing-not terrible. Just not my cup of tea or whiskey. Fair prices. Clean. We are more than happy that we got an off-the -cuff recommendation for this place several years ago.

dYEg2NVwVqGjIFNowPk-yA.text: ordered a burger with a side of jalapeno coleslaw thinking it was made with some kind of jalapeno based sauce. what I received was a bowl of regular coleslaw with one sliced jalapeno on top. 5 stars for being so literal.

D7gU5VzTkNBkr-wr4dtT0Q.text: This place is always chill. Great service and really good wings! Easily the best lunch spot in the area and great for evening sport events as its not overly crowded yet still exciting environment. Def recommend the chipotle raspberry sauce for wings and def get their beer battered fries, holy cow they're amazing!

6eO-9tuLj80vjAK_Od_hjw.text: I came in for a couple of pints of Guinness,  first tasted ok (not what I'm accustomed to, but not bad). Number 2 was not good...noticed that the bar keep didn't know how to pour it.  When I asked for my check (my card had been handed to a different host without telling me), I mentioned the taste of the Guinness,  and the bartender and waiter became very defensive...both came to me to apologize to me, but didn't ask what the problem was. Not sure what I did to make them uncomfortable,  but I just settled up, finished up (as much as I could) and went home.  Not sure I should come back...kinda weird.

08mW22ysYc7Xw1FSOF6rrA.text: Can't beat this place! Excellent service, excellent food, excellent company!  I've been a regular (although not as often as I'd like lately) for over 4 years, and its always awesome.  From Brenda, to Heather, to Erin and of course Kendra, all of the staff at CK's is amazing!   Great place to hold a fantasy draft or just drop in for wings (raspberry chipotle grilled with a side of hot!) and a beer.  You're always treated as a VIP at CK's!

Qt42FrfICPXlorf_5Kdivg.text: Food was amazing, healthy and fresh. Brittany was just icing on the cake with her great customer service. Price was very reasonable too. We will definitely go back to this neighborhood bar

1awNIzBp3srSy3IQRwKpkg.text: Not too shabby of a spot... cool for drinks and wings type occasion. Not in a rush to go back. Staff was very friendly however. Burger was somewhat bland.

BJwDLzzCq5hpetFCPIWCiw.text: If Tukees think this is the business of the year, I am concerned we don't have high enough standards. Food is good, yes. Decor and cleanliness is lacking - big time! Grease coats the framed jerseys and posters, and woodwork hasn't been maintained since it was built. The place is dirty! The place is tired and needs a remodel.  The bathrooms are from the 80s (and can't even lock the doors or sit on the commodes due to no seat covers available), the OHIO theme is ugly, and the dining area makes me feel like I never left the disco era.   Come on CKs - make us proud in The Tuke, so that we could consider bring guests here without embarrassing ourselves.  Fellow Tukees there are so many places in The Tuke we can go and get great food AND feel good about being there.  CK's doesn't meet the standards of the specialness of Ahwatukee.

_vyjJ7EpayIqBhwDnj8chA.text: We used to love CK's and visited frequently. The old happy hour was awesome-both food and drinks for a great price. The kids also loved their kids meals (around $4).  A few months back (after their "remodel") the prices changed and so did the Happy Hour specials. The service also seems to be lacking now as well. Last time we were there we had a party of 10 and they couldn't get out orders right. Some of the party was finished eating before the other food was brought out.  Parking is always hard, so just park further out in the parking lot and walk. Or better yet, take Uber.  We loved going to see Chuck E Baby there. I know he still performs there, but I'm not sure it's worth going back.

r1edVYOdBvaiG3bH99QNhA.text: It was a Friday night date night and CK Tavern was the place that was picked, it was his pick and I was going with the flow.  We were seated ordered our drinks, then the conversation just started to flow, our waitress came by 2 twice to see if we were ready to order and to be honest we hadn't even picked up the menu as of yet. She then told us to let her know when we were ready, and after an hour went by we took her up on that offer.  I wound up ordered the Chicken Cheesy Phil with a side of fries. This was a great little sandwich, chicken was perfectly cooked, the bread soft yet firm. It also had the perfect amount of cheese too, not too little nor too much, I have to say I really enjoyed my sandwich.   We wound up staying for few more hours, and I had to ask him why he picked this place because he is neither into baseball, football, basketball, and he said it was because it was close to my work. Scored him some bonus points! Haha   CK's a great place to catch some games, grab a drink or just hang out with some friends, glad I gave it tried, and look forward to coming back!   **oh because this was a 1st date night, I wasn't fully comfortable with exposing my Yelp Nerd yet, so no photos were taken :( haha **

ghLkKDaN4HLImbvg8_9ZfQ.text: Recently relocated to the neighborhood and CKs is our new hangout.  Awesome service every time we visit, food is great.  Live music every weekend.  Great local hangout!

3-g6ozbi8lfGtgzLWoae3g.text: My boyfriend and I used to visit CK's Tavern & Grill more often before we relocated to another part of our city. I remember ourselves getting the wings for a late dinner. One more must-to-try is their Stella on tap! Generally, this place in great, except for the time it's getting too busy.

yb0AMU8bF7Q_n5Rx7YwsvQ.text: Been going here for years, no over a decade now.  Always been invited by family and neighbors of Ahwatukee.  I try to talk them out of it but I get stuck going.  Why only 2 stars- the food is so below par, it's obvious they get items from Costco.  And it's over priced.

1mSeqZw_Uh4yW4wXhTr7MA.text: Ok I have now moved up CK's to the 5 star elite group. I keep coming back for wings, salads, burgers and their sweet daily specials. My honey likes them too. So I recommend this to everyone that wants to have a good time. Music is good too and so much more....

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Enjoying the sweet16 with John the main man at CK&#39;s. Best place in Ahwatukee by far....

3j3F6mlLjpkHhUOWWpwCkQ.text: I wish I had come to Yelp before going here. The service was the worst I've had in at least 10 years. The bartender was too busy talking to either her co-workers or some guy she knew to be bothered with basic things like asking me and the guy sitting next to her if we needed anything else, if we needed to pay or if we wanted anything.  I ordered the sliders (which only came with cheese and meat by the way) and had the person that brought it out pretty much drop it in front of me and walk away. At 99% of establishments they ask "do you need anything else?" but I guess service isn't a priority here. Usually ketchup and mustard are at least brought out, but not here. I had to ask for everything from napkins to a menu.  The bartender was either story telling or just talking because all I could see is me waving trying to get her attention for about 5 minutes and all I heard was her dropping f-bombs when talking to this guy who I assume was a regular.  I left a little note on basic customer service but I'm sure it'll go ignored. My first impression of this place is really as low as it gets. Bad service, average food and a wasted night.  I truly believe in supporting local business but this was dreadful. I would advise anyone to avoid this place at all costs. Very, very unimpressed with everything about it.  You've been warned.

8I7IERyzmTU5u_pwKGkmwQ.text: My office just moved to Ahwatukee and so my boss treated us to lunch as we got more familiar with the new neighborhood. Our staff enjoyed a variety of salads and sandwiches, but the menu has pretty much anything you'd want at lunch or dinnertime. And beer, but that wasn't on our agenda this time!   I ordered the teriyaki chicken sandwich and tots. YUM! It was soooo good. I didn't have much to say at the working lunch, because I was too concerned with stuffing my face! I really liked my meal. The sandwich was even complete with two pineapple rings and teriyaki sauce for a sweet combination! Our service was attentive and the bathrooms were clean. I think our staff will be making CK's a regular thing!

LdRR-7vqBAtDzHldbeEMJw.text: I was surprised the food showed up so quickly but then I realized it was probably sitting out for an hour or so earlier. The wings were bone cold. The pastrami sandwich was almost as cold. Here's the kicker. How can you screw up water. The water we ordered could not be consumed. It tasted like it had chemicals in it. If I end up with a tumor I'll know it was because of this place. Do not enter. Drive down the street a bit further and try your luck somewhere else. I am not sure why this place was rated so high. My guess is that their taste buds were burned off in the intense Arizona heat.

UP9Jeea2Fy1DXgpDpY22vA.text: Dive bar experience at upscale prices. Good place for cougar hunting, so it saves a star.

6z3ajbBwldh6JT_mH7EJzg.text: I love love love their raspberry boneless wings.  SO GOOD.  they also have really good burgers and its just a fun sports bar.  The prices are decent and service is great.  I always return for the same thing my wings!

aIRceKOt0zig9B9Yx-zTiw.text: Been there once for happy hour they have great deals good food and a lot of options. Only bad thing I can say is it's kindve dark and there and not really welcoming for a sports bar but the staff are friendly and attentive

sple5ACpt5CbfqGbh8Ostw.text: Expected more from a place that claims business of the year.  My wings were over cooked and the bartender seemed like I was bothering him. Love the patio for a beer and a game though.

5O3ci-WjsNQ_mECQ71LwWQ.text: My first yelp, CK, just be thankful I wasn't there with my adult daughter and wife.  As a professional chef I am not the easiest person to go for food with, that said I have visited CK often enough to know what to expect, decent food, price and service.  Wife and daughter have dinner, daughter orders a stadium dog, one bite "meh". Takes another, not liking the taste, doesn't eat it too salty.  Server comes by asked her about the dog, didn't like it and says she will take 1/2 off and leaves the bill.  My girls look at each other and with question marks on thier faces, " 1/2 off, why not just comp the meal?"  Asst. manager comes to the table and asks about it and my talented professional server daughter says she didn't like it, he says " I will take it off the bill.  My girl says thanks, not asking or expecting anything, just going to pay and next time don't order the dog. Next here comes the manager, lets call him MR. Duche.  He starts to grill my girls over a 1/2 eaten dog, "What's the problem, you ate half of it so we should only take 1/2 off."  They tell him that the asst. mgr. was the one taking it off the bill, no grumpy customers here, Mr. Duche continues to say that he was wrong and he will deal with his Asst. later.  Mr. Duche continues to discuss the 1/2 eaten meal and my kid is like what the hell is going on, lets get out of here.  Manager looks at my wife and says can I get you anything else, maybe not because your daughter wants to leave.  Take a look at the other reviews, pattern, just be thankful Mr. douche I wasn't there

gLtFG8J0jHWQw_rdtmE0VA.text: Bottom Line: CK's is my take out wings place, excellent quality, reasonable price easy pickup.  It's also a great place for live music, good appraisers and a pretty decent happy hour menu.  It will continue to be one of our Ahwatukee neighborhood places to frequent!

LP5WQmVJumM0NNVEgc_LKA.text: CK'S is a great place with great food, great service, live music and a love for the community. Kendra and staff go out of their way to make your experience enjoyable. We love CK'S!

Q2SgOmx37ORudniNiZGaEQ.text: I've heard so many great things about this place that I was looking forward to giving it a try after moving into the area. I've given it about 1/2 a dozen tries and have to say I've been underwhelmed every time. I keep trying new things, trying to find something I love and would continue to come back for. I've had no luck so far. That said its a great place to watch a game and the staff has always been great. I'm sure I'll be back for cocktails and to catch a game. I'll just probably eat elsewhere before going.

YIL1LgeEbTlYU5t_odoldQ.text: Great happy hour! If your late night eaters like we are,  make sure to call first and ask if they are still serving food.

nemzcWY1os6xuoTGpoC1eQ.text: Love CK's! Food is consistently good and staff is friendly. Really good salads and hot sandwiches. Drinks are always served cold and quickly. Only complaint is about the pushy, intrusive, and rude table busser. What a mistake keeping him around to end great dining experiences on a sour note.

cqoEeEfiQTEbLWxSPYuMPg.text: For a two-month period this Summer and early Fall, CK's was a remote office as well as a Saturday night hangout for me. Fond memories, actually.  Good:   Very good wifi Snappy service Sports-bar menu items Good patio where you can smoke cigars Live music! (including a band staffed by employees of Fender Guitars) A fairly good place to meet new people (I found).  Not so Good:  Sports-bar menu items (and not much else) Limited parking (at times)  A good place in the neighborhood, and one of the few things that tug at me to return to Ahwatukee.

dblfrU27znnWB4VJ0AxtEA.text: Honestly, I love to dance and have been here a couple of times just for that reason.  I also am a 'lovely woman' of a certain age and just don't feel comfortable in a place frequented by a majority of 20 and 30 year olds.  I do like that age, don't get me wrong...but notice the word "majority".  Anyway, I digress. What I'd like to point out is that the crowd is a mix. Yes, there are people older than 30-ish and that's why I love it.  I decided to spend my birthday dancing the night away and that's the place I chose.  When I called them about reserving space for myself and my zumbalicious friends, they were so kind and reserved the space.  They didn't even mind the birthday cake we brought.   The staff is great and the fun is plentiful.  They have pool tables as well. The food is okay; I'm probably not a great person to review the food since I've only eaten there once.  We go mostly for drinks and dance. (We're in walking distance..)  ANYWAY, check it out. You'll be glad you did.

Xtm877a66TrbY323n_lYTQ.text: Of course you got to get the boneless raspberry GRILLED wings! Yummm! Must go here if you are new to the area! And I like the sweet potato fries! Also they usually have any and all sport games that you want to watch.

izryl2Ida-JLyI-KUELoSw.text: Love this place. Its close to my house, all of the staff is friendly and the wings are great! Definitely try the chipotle raspberry wings!

BvDrmBn43J5l-Hb-QKiIaQ.text: My husband and I have been coming to CK's for a few years.  I must admit, it has declined over the years.  A Bar Rescue is in order.  Recently on our last few visits we have noticed an increasing displacement in our experience.  Last night was the defining experience to seek yelp to express our displacement.  Here are some of our dislikes:  The food is not fresh. 1.  We ordered the potato skins.  they were not fully cooked and very dry- difficult to cut and chew.  We returned them -the 2nd plate replacing them were still difficult to eat they were dry.  2. We ordered the meat loaf dinner.  the meatloaf was dry and the barbecue sauce used on it was so bitter and too spicy to eat. the mashed potatoes listed on the menu were not the mashed potatoes served.  The mashed potatoes were plain and tasted bland.  3.  The server appearance was unkept.  hair unkept and clothing not professional.  The server was inexperienced and did not pay attention to our needs. We witnessed her walking in circles through her section and not checking in with her customers.  food not brought out in a timely fashion.   We ordered our drinks and she forgot my husband's drink and we sat and waited until she came over.  She did not clear off our table after serving us, leaving dirty plates and paper on our table.   4.  The Bar and seating area appeared dirty and unkept. behind the bar it appeared unkept and unorganized.   I hope the owners read this and find a solution  Both my husband and I have decided to not return after this recent experience.

xwOofdGt0Nw4mTv5lr-YvQ.text: Short and to the point:  Excellent Happy Hour "half-off" prices on appetizers, and all of them we chose were good-to-excellent.  My son and I got a TON of food, and I drank a Bloody Mary, and with food to take home and two very full tummies, we paid $30 including tip.  Prices are reasonable to say the least.  Gonna take the kids back again on another Friday.  Parking kinda tight in the busiest times.

WaJn8L0-Zj3cbw96rRJKEw.text: I should have reviewed CK's months ago! It is one of our favorite places! The happy hours are fantastic, and on top of that they also have daily specials! Our favorite day is Thursday, BOGO half off chicken sandwiches! And not just a plain old chicken sandwich... the possibilities are endless such as BBQ, Hawaiian, Avocado, and more. With beer battered fries, sweet potatoes fries, buffalo chips, tator tots, again too many options to even remember!   Everything I have tried there is delicious and a big portion. They always have great drink specials too! And on top of all of this... their servers are the best, especially Tommy. I love CK''s for watching a game, dinner, or just hanging out!

YyPjWqZjf7NvFSsStkcNkw.text: This bar is what a Walmart plus a Benigan's (old school bankrupt TGI wannabe chain restaurant) version of a bar would be.   The whole place has this strange odor...  The food is all fried, oily or piled on with a bunch of different sauces and marinades...  The drinks are cheap but you get what you paid for. Their wells is the $3 per bottle generic ghetto brand. So, their drink specials are not worth drinking since it will taste like watered crap.  Check out the Maricopa Health Dept Restaurant Review website - this place has had major violations - ex) having outdated food in their fridge and brown slime mold around the soda nozzles at the bar. Disgusting.  It's too bad that there is no cool lounge or bar in this area and this is the only bar that most locals like to go to. But hey... most people's expectations in life must not be very high if they frequent this place.   Oh and I want to state one last thing: If you WORK at CK's you can't CHECK IN and become the DUKE. That's double dipping. It's pathetic that you want outside attention for just showing up for work.

anqD3w5PsY3XBij4X78H6g.text: I have finally joined Yelp and need to make it a priority to share my thoughts about CKs.  I have been going to CKs well over two years now.  I used to be a regular (until I had my baby) and try to make it back to CKs every chance we get a free night.  First and foremost, the staff that works at CKs are amazing.  My boyfriend and I have developed "friendships" with most of them.  They all are very attentive to their customers and make you feel welcome.  Second, the food is unbelievable.  I have had almost every item on their menu.  Some of my faves are the veggie burger, the chicken tenders (because they will dip them in the raspberry chipotle sauce if requested) and any of the salads!  Our food has ALWAYS been served hot and has never been more than a 10 minute wait.  This is the one and only place I will watch football on Sundays!  There are so many tvs and the Sunday football crowd becomes almost family.  I am a huge Bears Fan and the Bears game is usually on in the patio area with sound (there are many Bears fans that have become family on the patio).  The breakfast on Sunday mornings is also fabulous!  I couldnt think of a better way to watch football.  I like that CKs is a casual place that includes good friends and good drinks.  Anyone that lives in the area should make it a point to stop in here and enjoy the good times!

fYK1c-P62h7iQ74nP4s3yA.text: One of my favorite bars to go to.  They have great boneless wings and fries. Amazing staff.

0sWgrEpjtUdIn1wiRjO8EQ.text: This was my first time here. I have lived in the neighborhood for years. I wasn't really expecting too much, but it was disappointing.i ordered a patty melt and it was very greasy. I can only compare it to something you might get from Sonic. So not worth the $10 it cost. I got tater tots with it, again, same as Sonic's. My friend had the pastrami sandwich, not great either. It was 3 thick and tough pieces of pastrami on a non toasted hoagie roll. She had beer battered fries which were fairly bland. Absolutely not a great meal. However, there is a ton of TVs and all the games are on. Our server Sage was really sweet. We didn't complain because we wouldn't have gotten any other food. So 3 stars because our server Sage was nice and the atmosphere was nice. As a neighborhood pub they could do so much better without even trying much harder.

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Greasy patty melt

p9vuRTlce8XfPxAPswrLfw.text: Very long time customer who spent $400 to 500 per month at CK's plus many many recommendations to others. Probably one of CK's biggest advocates. Wife ordered a basket of popcorn. At end of night, when the check was presented ($60) we were charged $1 for the popcorn. This had never happened before? I ask a couple of experienced servers and was told it is discretionary depending on the check total. Both servers looked at my check (again $60) and said no, you should not have been charged, stating the rule of thumb is any check over $30 and popcorn is typically comped. I asked to speak to the manager (Chris) who tells me that CK's has been charging for popcorn the last 3 years. Huh, news to me. But didn't want him to argue with me, since he arrived at our table looking mad/aggressive and ready to go. Was completely unaware of the popcorn charge, but I did notice an across the menu price increases of ~12% about a week earlier however.  Long story short, Chris decided to play hard ball and refused to remove the $1 popcorn from my check, because he didn't like the way I "Came at Him".  What does that mean??  Is that the way CK's trains their "Managers" to address a customer and talk with them or in my case "to" them? Don't know what "Come At  Me" means, but I was polite and seated during the entire conversation.  A matter of fact, My wife and I kindly relocated from our previous booth seat to a high top in the bar so Kendra could accommodate a large party at our original spot. By any definition, this incident was a colossal customer service 101 failure. Really? Apologize and comp a 10 cent basket of popcorn and retain a high value, $500/month previously loyal customer versus be a jerk to the customer and his wife and make it so they never return. Hope Chris the "Manager " thinks he won?  Most would have comped an inconsequential basket of popcorn rather than lose a family that has spent thousands of dollars at their business. Short sided and demeaning service that disrespects an original patron to the business.

5bAdD5ZtekDrcbEc3EFl0w.text: This is our neighborhood bar!  We are pro happy hour and bar people!!  Don't judge!   Great atmosphere to watch football!   We are Broncos fans and we have a small group that sits outside.   Even when we play rival teams it's alway a friendly fun time!! Great food for a bar!!  Not gourmet but for a fun time reasonable price in Awhatukee.  Nothing better!   Big Father will fill you up!  The reason we are writing our reviews is because of Katie!   Not for sure if I spelled it right but she is the best!   She is kind,friendly and sweet!   We go there and she is always happy and fun!   I drink PBR and my glass never gets close to empty until i get a full one from her.  Can't say enough about her!   Hope she stays here for awhile!  We love her but we know she will go on to big and better things.  Awesome Awhatukee bar!!!   Did I say PBR ON DRAFT!!! Enough said

xZZgiLC-JIDV5QM_gGf9nA.text: My brother and I ordered food to go from this place today.  First they stated that they sent our order out with another customer so they offered my brother a beer as he waited for our food.   When my brother brought the food to my place, the chicken in the quesadillas were NOT even cooked so I called to speak to a manager and all she could say was that she was sorry.   I have been a regular at this place for many years since I have lived in Ahwatukee since 1996.  Well I will NEVER go to this place again!!  The quality has not been the same now for years.    My recommendation is do not eat the food there to go!  Only eat it at the restaurant.  The managers there are also unequipped to handle issues.

0UC4f4b-1l_AzI0ic_vUtQ.text: This place has got one of the most authentic Midwest Friday Fish Frys that I have found. Also the raspberry chipotle wings are a must try!

n8c-Yn7XSbv_Q9-fsHkj7w.text: Did not have such a great experience tonight at CK's. Not sure what was going on. We have been here quite a few times in the past few months and I have come to the realization that CK's is just okay most of the time. They do a few things really well and most others not so much. I really like the original burger sliders and the pulled pork sliders. I also enjoy the boneless hot wings. Other than that, my experience has not been very good.  Service is pretty good most of the time. Tonight it took at least ten minutes after being seated to be greeted. Our waitress did apologize and she look stressed so I felt for her. We ordered the pepperjack cheese dip with tortilla chips. It was not good. It was pretty much velveeta heated up in a cup and the chips were extremely stale, tasted like they had been sitting around for at least a month in an opened bag. I ordered the french dip sandwich for my entree (see attached pic). It looked pretty good. Looks can be deceiving. It was bad. The beef tasted off. Like beef that had been sitting around too long. Very unappetizing. After two bites I was done. All of the food in general looked old and not at all fresh tonight. A huge turn off. If our dinner was this bad, how bad was the food in kitchen? Just an all around bad experience tonight.  I still gave two stars because I think that this place still has potential. I am asking that if the manager or owner read this, please take note of this experience tonight. Take a look in the kitchen and make some improvements.

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. French Dip

yJytovZO_bfE7T7c94wdtw.text: So this place was "interesting". I wasn't expecting a typical "smoker's neighborhood bar feel" atmosphere. I can say that the food was decent and service was actually excellent. We had a friendly and attentive server who made it a great experience as she knew it was our first time there. They honored a coupon we had that had just expired so that was good customer service. Our food came out relatively fast too. I wouldn't return only because it's not my type of place. It looks like an older restaurant, sort of run down feel and not my type of crowd. But if you're ok with this type of bar, this is your place. I guess I was expecting more like Native New  Yorker as I had heard (whether it is True or not) that the same owner owned this place. I felt like it belonged in Apache Junction, not Ahwatukee.

4IeuqMvYb3U8WT_tnHLuSQ.text: Great bar food and atmosphere. Food was really good and the service was excellent. Had the happy hour wings with the raspberry chipotle sauce. Fries were cooked perfectly... Great stop to meet friends.

7BMFRbpQHyAsKBi3AAwxsw.text: Sticky seats, dirty tables, and poor service!  My family and I came here for the first time today. Sat down and ordered a drink and then waited 25 minutes before the waitress ever came back.   Terrible service waitstaff forgot about us. Never going back!

IFDAkwU70tGQTEYY3HluJg.text: I went to CK's today because I received a bunch of "welcome to the neighborhood" coupons for moving to Ahwatukee. I guess they treat their residents right in this suburb!   Being that I was getting free food, my expectation was that they were giving away free food because they were desperate for customers. Far from it though! I went here on a Tuesday night and you'd think it was a Friday night. Very busy for a weekday, but still quick and friendly service.   Great atmosphere, lots of TVs and great patio seating. I used the free boneless wings coupon and tried their house flavor called "Chipotle Raspberry". I can see why it's so popular - great flavor and a perfect blend of spicy and sweet. As for the wings themselves, this place definitely has the best boneless wings I've ever had. Rather than the traditional from-the-package frozen and reheated wings, CK's uses actual chicken (who would have ever thought this was possible) and they are hand tossed/breaded. Definitely worth a try if you're like me and don't like bone-in wings.   There's a lot more I want to try here and it looks like a good place to have a beer as well. Seems like it might be geared toward the older crowd, but as I said I went on a Tuesday. Maybe it's different on the weekend. You should definitely try this place out!

UX7vXjitR0Vd11z9zEjuMA.text: First time here it was memorable. The chucky baby allstars are awesome. They made the night. I will be back if they are playing. Great band. Thank you CK's

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States

sp6xPMxdVGXg81Xx4I9BAA.text: My friend and I went here for dinner last week.  I was surprised she selected this place as neither of us drink, and it's definitely a sports bar.  She said it's a neighborhood hangout, and we both live in the neighborhood, so there ya go!  That being said, the food is bar food and nothing more....so don't go with high expectations about the food.  People go there to drink and watch sports on the many TVs located through out the restaurant/bar.  They DO serve salads though, so I ordered the taco salad with the grilled chicken.  I always bring my own salad dressing, so I took that and everything worked out fine.  The waiter was nice and very accommodating.  I probably won't go back just because I'm not a sports-bar kind of person....but if you are, this is a good place to go.

5-1I5a3p2GTxu2wh09g7Qg.text: Best wing sauce in town.  If you live in Ahwatukee (or anywhere else for that matter!) this is the place to go.  Food and staff is great.

GS6YtdINmVNYj1n022dt1Q.text: Really wanted to like the place. The wings were fair. Never got to try anything else. NOT at all busy, but asked for a menu, received menu, and was summarily ignored for more than seventeen minutes. I only know the exact time because I texted my wife "just got a menu. I'll call after I order." seventeen minutes before she came back and I asked for my check instead of ordering. What is wrong with service these days?  Looks like I'll give someone else my money for dinner tonight.  That said. The happy hour isn't terrible.  Avoid the patio unless you like smokers.

jkDUqSJZpH6-HCBFLhvLXw.text: CK's has delicious food. My favorite is the carne adovada. My teenage son orders the cheeseburger every time. My daughter likes the mac n cheese. And, the dinner salad with bacon and cheese and boiled eggs is perfect.

B1axh6jfiNBedQuTydx8zA.text: What can you say about CK's? I've been here one other time to see a band, and tonight the same reason. Great beer selection, didn't have any food.  Seems like everyone is a regular here, and the type of place that the bartender knows what your drinking before you even sit down.

FeATUFySdotndbmmK0QZ2g.text: I have been coming here for years. The French dip is great and so are their frys. The owner is very friendly and the staff is as well.

G5SOQQkhxNfH93w9-5NouQ.text: This has been my favorite place in Ahwatukee for more than 10 years. I come here at least once a week because it is the perfect place to get great food and giant beers.  Sometimes people go to a restaurant once and have a bad experience. I strongly believe that is not enough to give CK's a 1 star review. Its also not fair to the restaurant.  Coming from a regular, this place is beyond awesome. It has everything and they do it better than anybody else. They go above and beyond every single time. Sure they get busy every once and a while. I might have to wait a few extra minutes sometimes, so what! You cant rush perfection. I will continue to come here until they close their doors for good.

TgDijvWj5w0u_yq-ky2o9g.text: Stopped in for lunch. Our server, Britt, was super attentive and got our drinks and food out quickly! We order the wings, hatch burger, and the California wrap. Everything was delicious. I will definitely be coming back!

VhKiUhqDS342X4CvxyZ6PQ.text: I have been going to this place for several years and it is just awesome! The food is amazing (The club sandwich and fries mmm) and it is a great place to hang out and have a few beers after work. The wait staff is always friendly and the live music is awesome! Keep up the good work CK's!

VrvlUBKcaYGybuSJKTMdwQ.text: Ate there with the fam a couple of times food was good, customer service sucked! Went there SAT to try and eat dinner with my 20 yr old niece after she got out of work like 10pm and they wouldnt let us EAT there because you needed to b 21 to set foot in there. The guy in the front that asked for ID was VERY rude and because of this experience I will never set foot in there again myself or with my family. I am going to let everyone I know the horrible experience we had and not ever recommend this place to ANYONE.

569LkbXIVkQAY_s9lf_FvA.text: I live nearby so this place is convenient. Always great service and tons of TV's to watch any and all sports. The raspberry chipotle boneless wings Rock!!!

bU67jSq-k-XH5sbp3omkkQ.text: Voted BEST in the area for everything! The Raspberry Chipotle Boneless wings are SO Yummie! . The menu is varied-- whtever you are craving , it's there. The portions are more than generous; you won't leave hungry! The kitchen is open late---The staff is very friendly and attractive. We really enjoy the live music at CK's-- especially Chuck E. Baby and the All-Stars--

EiR2hx8SfBmX4JjzYeILYQ.text: Nice change of pace from Native New Yorker, but the food just isn't as good.  WAY too many smokers on the patio, so you can't enjoy the nice weather unless you are breathing in cancer fumes.  Saw pregnant woman drinking here, and question bartender ethics (she was actually double fisting a beer and wine).

jKNZjfiH0pVPqr5QlxgYoA.text: Really good service.  Food prepared fast and was pretty damn good.  We went on a Friday and it was busy but not crazy.  The reviews are accurate.

eVmPBXxKvxOJkSN-Art39A.text: Food is crap the servers and staff are all rude and stuck up. I use to go there a few years back same staff but just to drink. I didnt like the mixed drinks other person that said they taste wated down with cheap liqure for drink specials. Not for younger crowds and dont feel welcome u less ur part of the bar rats that are always there. Not a family place like it use to be. Look at there maricopa records for heath department i a  suprised they havrnt been shut down. Good luck if u choose to eat there. Ps if u thi k cus they have a lot of five stars those are the bar rats that are friends with owner and staff. Take my word for it go to bleachers staff is nice food is good and the drinks are always what u ask for and are made right.

VX8ANsYEp3bvgaOO2CoTAA.text: Daily specials friendly staff, great place for the game tv on every wall. You could not sit anyware and not see tv!

_mzl3T6Rn7SakouSKt79fg.text: Upon my friend's urging, I ordered the raspberry chipotle wings. Unfortunately, I had them finished off on the grill. Although I do like this done on some wings, I feel that they lost some taste. My friend lives around the corner from CK's and always talks up the wings. The wings are pretty damn good though.

UAqzvTMSLUYkXXZ_o43umg.text: We were looking for a great place to watch a college football game and tried CK's after reading positive reviews online.  We called ahead to make sure the game we were looking for would be on and they confirmed it would be.  We got there and were seated right in front of 2 big screens one on top of the other with our game on the bottom screen.  So far, so good.  We thought we'd hit pay dirt and had found the perfect place to watch ball games in our area. Another party came in and was seated in the booth right next to us looking to watch another game.  Their game was tuned onto the set above our game.  They didn't seem happy to have their game on the top TV and asked for the volume to be turned onto their game.  The bartender came over with the remote and turned the volume OFF of our game and WAY up on their game.  When my husband gave her the "what's up?" signal she said "I know, know. - they're here every week.)  I can't remember ever being blatantly told that another customer is more important.  We asked for our check, paid and left.  CK's advertises themselves as a friendly neighborhood place.  I guess you just have to be an established customer to get the "neighbor" treatment.

BDd3H4FSSEBQMFCbPqHqtA.text: Recently moved back to Ahwatukee and hadn't been into CK's since it was Bar Nun years ago. Have to say the food was great and portions were BIG!! Raspberry chipotle wings are great and the Bleu Cheese burger and Hawaiian Chicken Sandwich very tasty! The staff were all great as well. It felt like it took a little long to get our entrees but It was a busy night because of the NBA playoffs and we had a 4 y/o with us so that could have magnified the wait. The only issue was that the bacon on my sandwich was forgotten by the kitchen. But since I didn't realize it 'til I was halfway done and stuffed anyway, it wasn't that big of a deal. 5th star next time when I get the bacon...ha. All in all a great neighborhood bar and grill that has good food and makes you feel right at home. We'll be back for sure....and probably often!!!!

dxZlvqesykDB5ZH0WJDYKg.text: This place is super close to my house so I visit pretty regularly. Tommy and Nick are two of the awesome servers usually out on the patio and I always have a good time with them as my servers. Sunday nights they have  $3 you call it's which is always a blast. The food is also pretty good... my favorite are the chili cheese fries. If you're younger like me (22) you may want to stray away from Friday or Saturday nights... since most of the local Ahwatukee cougars are out on the prowl but it does make for some interesting sights if you do venture out on these nights... but I prefer to stick to the weekdays. All in all a good place to hang out, catch the game, or shoot some pool! GO!

4LzBGjDQ17C4Bl5qqjpcwg.text: My family and I love this place. Yummy food, great service, kid friendly, rarely a wait, great prices, nice beer selection, food always comes out hot, and people around you are having a good time. The boneless chicken with raspberry barbecue sauce is so so yummy!

qpE90tSTNWaz4Ii5-Nw2OA.text: Nice local bar.  Good wings, i tried the chipotle sauce and can say that its delicious.  I also have tried the slop burger and its a better than average burger.  They have some pretty fun bands.  Does not purchase ufc ppv.

tU5ju-6n2JgBlYDu2HABKg.text: Dig it!!!  Love the food. Go with the Reuben! The rings are a good bet too.  K runs a sharp shop and all her staff know what they're doing. Thanks for keeping my personal beverage handy when I visit.  Might need a few more sets on game nights.

VczNWuAsjhtRUpJxBGTP3w.text: I seriously love this place, it has a comfortable atmosphere with a bar and also dining area for families. They have the most amazing wings and dipping sauces! i LOVE GOING TO THIS PLACE!

FhH5mFCtXTnupqwyw6S2vA.text: Good food, great sliders, great bartenders, service is fantastic

updwH6ot1kmQ4ePVtn9R5w.text: We love taking out of state guests to our neighborhood Cheers bar aka  CK's in Ahwatukee for the fabulous food and a nice outdoor seating area. The raspberry chicken is my husband's favorite and the burgers are excellent. For a nice family setting (no frills) with excellent food and service at a reasonable price, you can't go wrong.

81k1TW2GMj2zNsRxkCBfdA.text: I visited CKs last Saturday as a family event after a funeral.   It was a fun time, decent food, and a relaxing atmosphere.   Our group took up most of the entire restaurant but all of employees were very accommodating and helpful.    The food was good and service at the bar great!    If I lived closer I would definately visit more often.

Cf_ZLqEK3y8nNGaFkjUGgA.text: CK's Tavern & Grill is a great place to grab a good meal and watch the game.   The staff is friendly, helpful and quick.  Sometimes the place can get busy, because it is a popular local hangout, so if you are in a hurry, just let them know and they will give you the extra attention.   Good place for kids, because you won't worry about them making a little noise, or messing up the place.  Later in the evening it's a great place to stop by and meet some new people.

mP--rSiGPCrcMJvBfNLHfA.text: Cks is such a great local watering hole. But don't think of this place as your typical bar. The food is not your average bar food. And the service always so great.  This is from someone who lives blocks from it. Outside of the food you need to check out the music on the weekends. They get some of the best of the best local music scene.

st8gKtc_nMQ73hCNkPIorw.text: CKs is great. Great happy hour. Great food. Great service!!  Plus lots of TVs. Try the boneless wings....you will be glad you did!

mPnB3P-v8tn5mgdPADyR5g.text: So glad we picked this spot for lunch on our vacation! The service and food were EXCELLENT! Staff was so friendly, and anticipated our needs. The cheese curds were amazing, as were the burgers! Homemade salsa was so good too!  If we are in the area again, we will definitely be back!

pdoedkIVws54vMX-AhbhOw.text: They treat you like family from the first moment you walk in. We found this tavern by happenstance and are now hooked. From the inviting design of the interior as you walk in, to the friendly faces that work at CK's tavern and grill, not to mention the food is outstanding, it truly is a home away from home. We had to go two nights in a row because it was so wonderful. I can't get enough of this place and will be a life-long regular.  If you haven't been, do yourself a favor and go. You'll be hooked too.  See you at CK's!!! Angel & Randy

lX1XmNFa2WXXQ5AOVTac9Q.text: If you had a real bar called Cheers this would be the place, the staff is very friendly, manager is always around if you have an issue and the food is amazing! Everyone knows each other and the atmosphere is fun

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Good times always

cPAa8uMsJUDo9GMln8Ynvw.text: The place is a very typical sports bar - lots of TVs and has a HH on the weekend.  PROS: Good service from our server and changed the channel for our game Prompt with refills and was really good with offering my date another beer Cheap beer during HH - $3 for Blue Moons  CONS: Wings were very average, was not a fan of the sweet ones. (Buffalo ones were better)

YrKkqfMm37LwmxUPyHiteQ.text: The wife and I came to see a great cover band our friends told us about.  Being our only time there, we left impressed.  Older crowd that quickly filled the very small space for dancing left me thinking they should rearrange tables on concert nights to allow more people on the dance floor.  Waitress was superb especially navigating the crowd.  Got the vibe that very loyal locals and all fun, good natured people.  We will definitely be coming back to catch local bands.  I believe the band was called Trip-Wire and these guys covered all the 70's-80's favorites and were great.

VqomQGgNbp4l1nbNOiJZgA.text: Best bar in Ahwatukee to watch a Cardinals game. Cold beer, reasonably priced and excellent wings. What more can you ask for. As a side note, sure beats Bleachers across the street.

TbFmaNjNuazyvJV_IMQdtQ.text: We have visited here once. I am still on the fence about this place. So much going on in one place.   First the beer is lacking! If you are into the usual american beer this is enough. HOWEVER, the wait staff said they don't sell much of it, but they do carry Huss Brewing Beer. Not sure why anyone would drink the other stuff, but if you like craft beers the local brews are here, but have to find them and remind the staff they do offer craft beers.   I liked the tvs all around and there is an app to listen to the screen if you bring earbuds. Which I think would be great if I were here to watch a game.  Ok. Onto the food. I ordered a Hatch Burger because someone recommended it. Totally not what I was expecting when I read the description, but I tried it anyway. Ham and a hamburger patty do mix well together. It also had Hatch green chile. It was very different from what I could get in NM, but it was oddly tasty. The burger served open faced on sourdough was good, but the sourdough was soggy. Who needs the carbs anyway! Next time if I were to order it would be just on the plate. I ordered a salad for my side. It was really good. Romaine!!! No iceberg here! It had everything I liked on it too. All the ingredients were finely chopped and added to the salad. Next time I would hold the bacon, because I don't like salad with bacon. The balsamic dressing was the best. The pickle spear, served with the burger, lacked crunch, but the salad more than made up for it. Brad ordered the carne adovada, he is brave and likes to search for food from home. It was not as good as home, but it was tender and moist. The red chile, or what ever it is called, was tasty for Arizona. He surprised me and ate the black beans. I have not acquired a taste for black beans, but he said they were good. Lastly, because Brad cannot live without dessert he order the Mile High cake. It looked nice and was dark chocolate flavored. He said it is moist and delicious. He said he would order it again. Of course! We will put this on the visit again list.

0kY2GVIeiIKuIvp9Cce0nQ.text: We had a couple drinks, wings and a southwestern salad. The chicken was rubbery and not very tasty. In terms of food, maybe it was an off night. The atmosphere was fun and the staff were very prompt and friendly. The drinks were great. We will go back again to try some burgers.

N8VVcVBDD2tOviIxYAvKNw.text: This is our new go to place for Wings, Beer, and Trivia.  They don't charge anything extra for the wings and they come in normal increments. They have Guinness and Strongbow on tap ( Snake Bites! ) and have the playmaker trivia all the time.The servers are top notch being friendly and come back to check on you just the right amount of times. Most of the food here is very good and comes out crazy fast. The wings are great and you should try the adovada pizza it was recommended by our server and tasted great.  If you are in Tukee give it a try.

KDib_o6pAFIrcAgw7dDJwA.text: UPDATE:  The owner did come over to talk to us and told us she will work on training her employees on how to handle people who cut in line. She also did comp one of our entrees which wasn't necessary but appreciated.  I've been here 5 times and 2x we've had some issue.  Previously it was with a large party for happy hr where our waitress told us a certain beer was 1/2 price but not on our final bill.  She did later remember and adjusted the tab but having issues 50% of the time doesn't seem like good odds.  Overall I do like their food and atmosphere but not too impressed with the overall service.  OLD REVIEW: It takes a lot for me to leave a negative review but I feel this place lacks proper management and is a bit chaotic.  Let me preface this by saying I've been here before so this review is not based solely on today's experience.  We arrived at 4:55 pm and we're told it would be a 20 min wait.  We were seated at 5:45pm.  The problem was that as tables opened up people coming in would sit in them bypassing the dozen or so people waiting.  Myself and another lady told the hostess but they still served them!!! This happened 4 separate times...why bother having a waiting list if you are not going to honor it.

G2lQgg1zBm9r-8u3DzA8Pw.text: Neighborhood restaurant/bar that really makes you feel welcomed. We had several appetizers which were all great. The burgers are fantastic! Will definitely come here again. If you can, ask to sit in Brittany's area- great service!
