Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States

yzhF2dJcYJ6ScjPDUXQT4A.text: Pretty much didn't want to say anything about this business again. I didn't even Yelp for a long time because of the bad taste in my mouth. But due to genuine inquiry from Yelp member ~ I will respond. I had a "friend" who told me over and over again of situations where they were being singled out by a staff members, being treated badly & ignored and drinks slammed down ( hostility) no response to requests, etc.  At first I considered the temperament of my "friend" and thought maybe he had rubbed them the wrong way or something, but, I kind of dis-regarded it until one time when I met that "friend"  there & I witnessed it myself. I was treated great but my friend was NOT. We were sitting at the same table. THE ONLY 2 AT THE TABLE. WOW!!! Okay, so maybe my friend (with some of his eccentricities) did something to offend someone, who knows? So I continued to patronize. Until 1 evening I came in and was hanging out with some of the staff( great people, I miss them) as they were getting off work had a couple drinks but sat and witnessed on the patio someone in a CK shirt acting very rude to a female - scary rude. Patrons: a cute little couple, a guy and a girl ~ they were cute little Yuppie types, college kid types or something, but obviously she had had a bit to drink and her date went inside to probably use the restroom or get their ticket I don't know but they have the guy with the CK shirt on acting very perpetratory towards her in her dates absence. This gal, I can assure you, would be lucky to have even remembered what she was experiencing the next day or for the next five minutes for that matter. I am 49 years old and I know what it is to see a perpetrator targeting someone in a weakened state. Her date came back and he scooped her up a little bit to help her outside. Comments were made from the employee to them as they left with laughter (one sided). And as they came around and we're walking behind me in the parking lot trying to make it to their vehicle there were still comments being made until that customer yelled out "why don't you leave us alone we're just trying to leave you need to leave us alone" and the employee (I only knew who he was because he yelled out) "what are you going to do about it who you going to tell I am the security at CK's!!!" OMG... I emailed my "old friend". I felt horrible that I never really believed what he was saying to me. Keep in mind, none of these situations were directed at me. At CK's they have some wonderful staff that are smart brilliant people that can brighten anyone's day. The food I miss so much. I miss my patio and I miss my misters ~ most of all I miss my friend. It was our Spot. When I have sent good review of this business it's owner immediately (within 30 seconds) responded thanking me. When I sent that review, she didn't respond at all. She didn't have to believe anything I had to say - she only had to look at the tapes. I gave her the dates and the time frames. She never asked/cared what happened. What I mean about having benefits being members is that there are specific dollar amounts that occurs so a business can pay to be a part of a Yelp membership and they call up and complain about my friends (honest) review of their business and then they said that it wasn't True or whatever and got it taken down. It wasn't until later that I saw what their security guard did to that couple. I thought Kendra would call me. I work in private sector Healthcare. I am also a local business owner. I am a single woman who wants to feel safe when she goes out to eat, drink & work. There are only two drinking establishments locally that I will NOT return to. I have seen business owners perpetuate specific behavior (even require it) from servers or staff to victimize men and women and it's actually part of their business model. Didn't have to happen to me. Not at CK's, anyways. But if it had or even just a "friend" I can assure you I won't be back.

yKS-OGFvbNuVcD-NY19Lsg.text: CK's Tavern & Grill is Outstanding!  Small town atmosphere with world class service.  I've seen thousands of sports bars around the globe, but none can touch CK's.  Kendra's heartfelt influence on the brand is felt throughout the entire place.  Bar food?  No this is feel good food with a hit of attitude.  Just the way I like it.  Brenda and Krista are always there when you need, yes, dare I say, another beer!  This is by far the best home town bar in Ahwatukee!

DyXjRzlNiV3rCq1V6TwZTw.text: Great food and Beer selection. Awesome place to watch a sports game. It sounded weird and i was hesitant to try them, but the raspberry chipotle wings are the most amazing thing ever. Service is always awesome and they even have live music on the weekends.

LOFMYH0fFHDeZ6iiLnavwQ.text: This little place has such a cool vibe. U walk in and there is music playing and pool tables and nice tables to sit and have dinner or just enjoy the awesome drinks and appetizers that are offered at happy hour.  The waitresses are so nice and helpful. It has become our new Friday night go to place.

e5dIt1tws-GYaeEdW1dZuA.text: CK's is the best bar in Ahwatukee.  We decided to head over there for lunch, and as usual they didn't disappoint.  We had the hatch Chile burger, a regular burger and a dozen wings(50 ea on Tuesday).  All of it was awesome, the hot flavor wings were perfect, no shortage of classic hot sauce here.  Also, they use pretty good quality chicken, no obvious fat on them and fried crisp without breading.  Even the carrot and celery were good, I didn't actually realize there was variable quality on the veggies, but there is; they're better here.  The two burgers were awesome, getting rave reviews around the table.  The seasoned fries are really more like thick chips, and they were good too.  Basically, everything was good.  They also have a good sized selection of beer on tap, so maybe we will head over in the evening and try something new on that front too.

MJSmYhbKFgN9FwY7T5O82g.text: Food is very good there very nice very clean don't have to wait long for food me and my family go there all the time affordable price

bzsObVFiB6BZRV9AUEG77w.text: Try their Guinness Mussels   We've been regulars here now for years, love the place and the people, and just had them for the first time . . . Really nice!  No dead mussels, tasty broth, and four longboards of baguette to soak it all up in.  Give'em a shot

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Guinness Mussels

oircyjtnI51deeS0rJLY8g.text: I have been to CK's several times. The service is great, and the pub grub is some of the best. We had the raspberry boneless wings for the first time last night, and they were awesome! A little breading, good raspberry sauce, with just the right amount of heat.  Good service, low prices, and big portions. Like Debbie, I also wished I lived closer.

RC0vE6KnFarpyDaHGh1Arg.text: Good place to watch a game or just enjoy happy hour. Do not expect anything fancy, this place is a bit of a dive. Sticky tables and menus with crusted food on the salt/pepper shakers. The staff is friendly and will go out of their way to help you out when ordering. The tortilla soup is fantastic, everything else is typical bar food thrown in a flash fryer.

zseSRJHYlWcFieUBdpR7nA.text: Great sports bar in the area with good food, service, and drafts. You are literally surrounded by TVs & can watch the game from every seat. The chipotle raspberry wings were really good, but the hot wings weren't all that impressive. Beef nachos were also good.

ThjwNZZSw87jKsxjd0V91Q.text: Alright, nothing special. Service was very good for how busy it was.

ZgDZAoSwzjDN_OZtoY_mdw.text: When I am in this part of town and want amazing food, Awesome service and friendly faces CK's is where I want to go. Sad to say that Tommy Pierucki is no longer there and has moved on to bigger and better things but he will always be credited with spreading the word to me and others about this amazing restaurant.

9lVkDlj69MlFj_0u7mmydg.text: I've been to this place a few times and I wish I lived closer. It's a great place to hang out, the service is excellent and what food I've tried is really good.  The bands I've heard there are good, too. There are a couple of pool tables and the patio area is misted so the summer heat won't be too bad.  We had our #evfn meetup here tonight and they arranged an area just for us. The server Katie managed everyone's separate order (as far as I know) without mistake, which almost never happens. Great job!  I'm sure we'll be back again.

woVC_63bEW9hPqdojEfszA.text: Had lunch at the tavern today.  Service was excellent.  The burger was cooked as requested, medium and was good, except it was a little dry.  The french fries were excellent.  Will go back....

IEY7nVsav4Van7pKWE1pHg.text: Nothing special, standard sports bar fare.  Probably better as a hang out spot than as a restaurant, which is what I was looking for.

Cc38ffzkDTbbj2YCPQA2iw.text: A really nice neighborhood sports bar. Sitting out on the patio was really nice with the perfect spacing of heater. Watching the staff interact with everybody it was obvious that this is definitely a regular hangout for many people.

bTAEZIFNnffiMt9mtt1Jow.text: THE very best wings!!  The raspberry-chipotle wings are unreal. If there is breading on this, I can't tell! Tastes like premium white meat chicken that is cooked to perfection.Truthfully they are so good, I have yet to eat anything else at this place and have been going for years.   The beer is served ice cold and the wait staff and bartenders are very friendly.  This is a great place to hang out and catch a game.  Doesn't matter if you come with a group or roll here solo, this place serves up quality food at great prices...especially  happy hour!

sOmNWs0O3A1t2YMqnKY1MA.text: CK's, why did it take so long for me to write a review on you?  Perhaps I have taken your awesomeness for granted.    I am always critical of neighborhood bars.  Read my reviews, I'm critical of everything.  Believe it or not, I've even been called an asshole.  The thing is, I really don't have anything bad to say about this place.  I hope the owner/manager reads this because the only way a local bar survives is with repeat business, and you sir and/or madam, have earned mine.  I will now use my college education to cite with examples:  Here is one thing you are kicking ass and taking names at Dirty Harry style. (did I fire five chicken wings or six?  In all the confusion, I have kind of lost track myself)  Daily specials.  Not only are they awesome, they never change.  Nothing pisses me of more than expecting something, driving down, and it is different.  I have been coming in for quite a while on Tuesday nights with one of my friends.  We always order the same thing (by the way, 40 cent wings on Tuesday and HUGE beer for $2.50...bring that shit on)   That leads me to your servers.  Usually, we are lucky enough to have the same one, and she is frigging awesome.  Knows our regular order, walks up, takes the menu's away, jokes and says "I know what your order is!" and brings it.  (extra buck or two on the tip just for that) Even if we have another server, they are always polite, attentive, and friendly.  Not coming up every 5 minutes bothering me or being non-existent.  Seems like they wait until you are 75 percent done with your drink and THEN ask if you want more.  Perfect.  They attack with military precision few possess.    Longest I think I have probably ever waited for my wings was 10 minutes.  Maybe.  Had a family birthday party here a few months ago on a weekend night and they made things VERY easy and everything was organized.  Still on the subject of the servers, seems like there is virtually no turn over here and the wait staff seems like they actually enjoy their jobs, not like my job and unlike some other bars where the employees are bitchy and seem like they would rather stab you in the throat than take your order.  CK's does not possess the bitchiness and violent tendencies as previously described.  Other good points condensed in cliff note form:   -Bands 3 nights a week with no cover.  Awesome.   -The video games actually work.  Nothing pisses me off more than cramming a few dollars into playing big buck hunter and the fucking gun is broken.  Or golden tee and the goddamn wheel is lopsided.  The "claw machine" actually has prizes you can win that are big enough for my dogs to at least have more than 5 minutes tearing up before I have to take it away. -pool tables aren't crooked or ripped up felt.  All required balls are present and accounted for (it is amazing how many bars think two or three balls missing is acceptable) -Bathroom is free of the typical "lake of piss" found under urinals or the crapper.  Also very little graffiti on the stalls. -I don't think I have ever seen a dirty table here longer than 60 seconds.  Nicholas Cage can't even steal a car that fast. -Patrons here seems to have a much lower douche bag ratio than most neighborhood bars.  Still there, just lower. -They serve Pabst cheap (honestly I can't drink that ghetto piss but my Dad loves it and that is why he comes here) -They have that awesome trivia shit on the TV's.  Bad points about this place:  ..............I'll edit this if I ever come across any.  Until then, this section stays blank.    Keep up the good work!

tQXOTLG3TwpvLyvz7N7_Yg.text: I love CK's. Their happy hour specials are great, service is awesome, and food is tasty. Try the adovada pizza...it's goooood.

-co2iU2jxINgKsiLIl4nnA.text: I LOVE the raspberry chipotle boneless wings! Fun place to go watch a game, the staff is always nice -  and Chuck E Baby plays on Friday night for dancing. We enjoy this place a lot!

kJMhEaKqHb7wKN3_CwZNbQ.text: Simple, great pub fare food. We had the club, brat sliders, and italian sub and would recommend them all. The fries and onion rings were fantastic.  The service was fast and friendly, and all was reasonably priced. Highly recommended!

SJPxW3hqAMDpX5RGDHL9Nw.text: Nice place to grab a cold one and listen to some live music. They have everything here that you need to drink...Red Bull to Vanilla Vodka, and lots of flavors of Carbonated Malt Beverages! The band was Rug-Burn and they played some killer cover tunes. There was a wide variety of clientele there, from early 20's Hotties, to some seasoned veterans. Overall a good time!

SS8HDUBOZiRh53Ahfmkbbg.text: Beer battered fries with chili was awesome lots of flavour but the wings were not very good dried and very little flavour but the service was great

1Cx3aa8xGNd49aOTWE3A0Q.text: CK's was a fun place to have an early Saturday night dinner.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that they have Happy Hour prices on Saturdays.  We ate on the outdoor patio, which was nice but does allow smoking. The BBQ pork sandwich I had was very good and the staff was very friendly. For Happy Hour or a fun night out, CK's is great.

zdhpmdDp16hMb-PD9AZARw.text: Again, my favorite spot in Ahwatukee for the last 10 years! The food is always great!

lP9fmYLNdieHjnz7JcKVpA.text: 25 oz Monster Domestics $2.50 (Happy Hour), Boneless Rapberry-Chipotle wings that are unreal, and fast and attentive service.  I've been coming here for years and it is as good as the first time, every time!

JwY7yYmX47Al6CurUrGL7Q.text: Its a nice little bar/ sportsbar.  They have some pretty decent wings, nothing spectacular, but if thats what you are looking for go to a wing place.  Their buffalo fries are yummy, thats what we default to when we go there.  Pretty good selection of beer, overall its a nice place to go and hang out with some friends and relax.

W9WuHlVb7oc08vMzNo6Omw.text: Had the wings. They were really good. The waiter, Dylan was awesome.   I will definitely come again.

xj5hVw3r3AiUIMmSp__ZEA.text: This is an update. It seemed that for a while the service, food and specials were in a steep decline after more than a few experiences. However, after giving them another couple tries over the last couple months, it seems things are back on the upswing. We stopped in for some food, happy hour specials and to watch a couple games on their many (many!) big screens. Steven was our server and he was super friendly, attentive, knowledgeable and on top of things. While they don't offer as many happy hour items as they used to, they still had a pretty good selection of food and drinks during happy hour. Watching sports here is really good, lots to see on lots of different TV's. The food is very good and prices are reasonable. Atmosphere is comfortable and relaxed. It's pretty clean inside and open. It definitely feels like a family business instead of a chain, and that's a good thing.   Favorites here include the boneless wings in raspberry chipotle sauce (these are super good, the sauce is different from anywhere else), regular bone in wings, tater-tots (who doesn't love tots?!?!), burgers are good and their spicy criss cross cut fries are awesome. They offer a HUGE burger that they took off the menu, but you can still get it if you ask, I think it's called the Grandfather Burger. It's great!  They have a couple pool tables and games, a decent patio with lots of TV's (but it's smoking out there) and even a private-ish room with games and tables you can reserve.  I love supporting local, family owned businesses and CK's seems to be back on the upswing, so that's great. We'll be back for sure and recommend you try it for yourself.

muvVDfbNTynBVbvJVYwBVg.text: We have continued to return and with great pleasure Friendly service Excellent food Great ambience Doesn't have that sports bar feel We even bring our out of town company there now  I'm considering doing a group for dinner soon

yHWc0XOvac2TKkX5pVi-xw.text: Just left this place! I had high hopes for this local bar especially because its walking distance from home. Unfortunately it did not meet my basic criteria.....Service, i came in sat down at the bar next to a really nice lady but waited 10 mins for anyone to come by and at the very least acknowledge I was there. Nope no one came and i honestly believe waiting anything more than 5 mins for bar service is not worth my time or money but I stuck around a little longer because I really wanted it to be my Thursday bar.  Sorry CK's I really gave you a chance but left without even an acknowledgment that I was ever there. Sad!

kIPwLZuJUQr5HmaIbqmOOA.text: We just moved to the neighborhood and tried out CK's for the first time. They have great yelp reviews and our neighborhood Facebook pages says they're the best sports bar so we were excited! We love hot wings and haven't found any around here that we love until we tried them here! We got a dozen, half medium sauce, half roasted garlic dry rub. Both were excellent! We ordered ours extra crispy (we always do for wings) and they came out perfect.   We both got a Mother Road Tower Station IPA to drink. I think they were 25 ounces or something but they were $6ish on happy hour! Awesome price!!   We also tried the Adovada Pizza from the happy hour food menu. It had great flavor but the tortilla on the bottom was very soggy (understandable from the meat and cheese being on top). We ate it with a fork and knife and got a few crispy pieces. The house made salsa was delicious! Next time I might just ask for a bowl with some chips!   Our server Drea was very friendly and gave great aervuhey have happy hour daily, tons of TVs and great food & drink specials. We look forward to coming back and most likely becoming regulars!

DYIJuqlGwZRElSkaiLxt0A.text: Good food, full bar, Great bands and solo artist appear here often. It can get crowded but That's not so bad.

SsnSvPiroUPpMiybWOQIiA.text: Food was just OK, place was dimly lit and just average. Waitstaff was friendly and helpful.

sI-n8raEM-Fo1U_kqcP6sA.text: Good chicken philly, great fries, great service and atmosphere. What more can you ask for!

qxbKkYX03OtVPL1lOc02Dw.text: Always great staff and service! This is the perfect neighborhood sports bar. Some nights they have a live band , usually Friday and Saturday nights so expect it to be a little busy and loud. Basic bar food but still really good.

xoyx8jOsTDlEjOYYjsSJyw.text: Yummy salads and delicious wings. The food always comes out fast so its a great place for lunch break!

FfuA_gaOkJQykLi90V0g5Q.text: After venting about some customer service issues we spoke with the owner and are satisfied with the resolution!

uWiAbSye7JEpy3ALI4sgwg.text: The band was good, the drinks were good, the staff was nice, so why do they decide to have last call one hour before they close. Why do venues insistent on chasing out the patrons one hour before they close. Maybe the staff would like to leave. Ok, I understand, however does the venue prefer not to make any money that last hour, because no one has any desire to buy anymore food or drink when you turn all the lights one hour before closing. Don't pretend to be open till 1am when you intend to run the customers out an hour early. So, this makes me hesitate to came and party with my friends at CKs again. Think if this is where you want to spend your money, there are a lot of other places in the East Valley.

msmap6nPbq1ux65881uMug.text: "Chincy in the ranch and the fries" but the fish was fantastic! Quote from my bf. I loved the fries but no unlimited refills. I'm sure ranch woulda been supplied if we asked.  The fish was fried to perfection and was tasty. Worth $11.99!

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States

yqMe14TjFyo00X8cYm-H3w.text: Pretty decent sports bar in Ahwatukee. Their food menu is decent but not earth shattering. I haven't been disappointed by anything but I also haven't had anything that was really memorable either. Ok beer selection but they have good daily specials that make it an economical place to have a meal and beer. Lots of TVs around the place make it ideal for catching sporting events. They frequently have live music and it is frequently mediocre. Not a great bar but definitely one of the better ones in the Ahwatukee area.

lPRRhMJFfIeq6ywOlYkEXA.text: Ck's was one of the worst experiences I have ever had. We went in the middle of the day to get wings which were honestly the worst wings. Mild buffalo was a weird cranberry sauce that was runny and didn't taste like buffalo at all. The honey BBQ was just wings with plain honey on them which was disgusting concidering the "boneless wings" we're dry chicken strips that were chewy and gross all around. There was no one there and plenty of servers who took 30 minutes just for drinks after telling him what we wanted multiple times. Didn't like the atmosphere food or people . What a let down for ahwatukee!

OlCPOBPDmWQt0lo0-DIE_Q.text: Please allow me to begin by saying that all my reviews are category specific, meaning that if I believe this place is a sports bar/pub, I'll rate it according to my relative standards for such an establishment.  That said...  This is a fantastic sports bar.  Big screens, cold and lots of beer, GREAT food, and good service.  While Cassie and I are not regulars, we have been more than 5 times now, and have yet to be disappointed.    When here, please try:  Raspberry Chipotle Boneless Wings - yes, as good as they say, and deserving of the "franchise" tag; Spicy K Barbecue Pork Sandwich - delicious w/ flavorful BBQ sauce and cheap!; Hatch Burger - spicy, w/ flavorful beef and cooked to order; Barbecue Cheddar Melt - fantastic!!!; BBQ Burger - if it's slathered in BBQ, it's delicious!; Beer-Battered French Fries - especially good w/ cheese; and Onion Rings - crispy and tasty!  My opinion is that these burgers are better than Delux Burger's...  Let the games begin.

EjiAhDx16pchara1pNvweg.text: I was here last Friday during the live music night. It was a little packed, nothing extremely crazy. I am asked for an ID since it's 21 + at night, and then the person just stood there talking to someone. I stood for a while then asked if I could seat myself, he finally said something "yes". I sit myself and wait about 10-15 minutes before anyone comes to me and even gives me a menu. I ask for a cup of water with extra lemon and only get water with no lemon after waiting a while. After waiting, and waiting, and waiting, I finally get someone to ask if I'm ready to order. I must say the people who run this place are cheapskates. They charge for every little thing, even a certain dressing on salads, and everything is over priced. I order a salad which comes out to $4. The salad was tiny, the dressing was disgusting, didn't taste like Italian dressing, and even after asking again, I never got my lemon for my water. I got ripped off and I'm not going back again. If you like over priced, mediocre food and terrible customer service, this is the place for you.

m7l0PP2o0Z29CUl5cC3SkA.text: Cocktails that "supposedly" contain liquor are DEFINITELY watered down.  As if the customer will never notice.  Stick with the beer.

A8gz6s4lsxvZ_v6xM4N8XQ.text: This place is fabulous! Best place for just about anything. Food is amazing. Try the meatloaf sliders with provolone (special) or the pulled pork sliders or Raspberry Chipotle wings.... the BEST.  Servers are super friendly and it's the best neighborhood bar you could find! All you haters can get on out of the Tuke. CK's is the shiznit! The patio is a great place to watch games and enjoy a fine Cigar and drink with friends. Can't get any better.

RJXKdWmiMg8KYcPvJoth2Q.text: It's not easy to blend being a good bar, a sports bar, a live-band bar and a place for good food. But CK's manages to do it.  My last trip here was for a birthday party over the weekend. It was packed, as usual, but they had no trouble accommodating the dozen-plus of us that showed up. Our waiter was fast and remembered every order. I'm still puzzled how they do that.  The band was great. I've heard 3 - 4 bands here. They always seem to rock. Well done, whoever does the booking.  In fact, it was such a good time that we're going to have #evfn here on Friday night!

pTxiqp8lzhAEBwiw06LoVw.text: Classic!! Such great food and the owner is the sweetest lady in the world! I go with my family all the time and it never gets old! Great service and great for Sunday football!

_jIqi_TUorvmA3fdjCumdg.text: CK's is a real find in the SE valley. Warm, friendly, yet vibrant. And... live music! Th. through Sun., check out the bands while you relax on the patio (no smoke there). What a way to unwind.  The service is very attentive. For example, when greeted we are usually asked, "Are you here for a particular game?" checking so that we can be seated accordingly. The wings are great (try the Chipotle Raspberry-- seriously!) and the burgers are big and juicy. They also offer a wider assortment than typical sports bar fare, such as Mexican specialties, salads and seafood.

Zhp2J5R47dEbQ-bLHEZPvg.text: CK is a great place to have around. We been there a bunch of times and never disappointed. Every single day they have drinks special, and some day food special. Like today is Blue Moon Pint $2 C'mon!!! Its great. Food is also excellent. Fresh, tasty and sizable. I favor their Special K sandwich - it really is very good. Ask for them to wrap it for you instead on the bun. Good stuff. They have inside and outside areas. Inside has 2 pool tables, bar and bunch of TVs. Outside is a nicely sized patio with a TV or 2. They do not mind if you smoke outside.  Just a note - parking lot is usually really full and it may take you a bit to find parking.   All in all CK's is a great place for lunch, dinner, watch a game and/or have a few.   "I like"  Eugene

ooSTmZfxud-GCIv1p8dctQ.text: Staying in Awathukee for 7 week escape from cold Alberta, Canada. CKs was recommended by a neighbour in our condo complex. The service was great and very friendly. The food was fresh and hot. The prices were very good too. Will definitely be back. The patio was a great place to hang out and watch the baseball games.

Y0F8u1Aw52N_3Gl_ajXsVw.text: I have two favorite bars in Ahwatukee. This is one of them. Yes you do think you have time travelled back to the 80's when you open the door. If you are looking for upscale Gastro Pub or a fancy mixologist to dazzle you, this isn't the place for you. I am a snob. I transplanted here from Portland, OR. Home of some of the best beverage and food in the country. So when I say CK's hits the mark, you can believe me. The Slop Burger is phenomenal. Good Happy Hour, although they need to broaden their choice of apps. The beer is cold. The well drinks adequate. The staff is friendly. It still has a jukebox that plays everything from classics to contemporary. My daughter likes to play the games in back, especially the claw. There's one well loved, well used, pool table in the back near the patio.  The appeal of CK's is it's bar that could exist in "anywhere" America. It goes back to the basics of what pubs and bars once were. Ck's is that meeting place within the community.  It proves that bars don't need to be complicated to be successful.  Couple that with good staff, good food and a sense of familiarity, and you have a winning concept. Cheers! See you at CK's.

g62oAWJWcDB0k5mQnfT8_w.text: This place is pretty great and it doesn't hurt that it is walking distance from my apartment. Really good food with more variety than normal bar food.  Great beer specials.  There is a band that plays Thursday nights and they mostly do covers of songs that are fun to sing along or dance to.  And...they have NTN.  What more could you want?

oX_niwxljcZYSWqqw5Ucwg.text: We had our annual holiday party in their back room. Great food, and service. Thanks for making it a big success! This place rocks!

iGFLHZk3L6MCaTv0CJwUZw.text: I love their boneless wings! They also have a good burger, but I wouldnt recommend their chimichanga. Good beer and good service.

xc-ILoO_Z0Lbv8ykHBGJ7g.text: I LOVE this bar. My first visit was in 2004 when it was known as Bar Nun. I'd just moved to AZ and I was drawn in by the neon green light and funny name. Little did I know it was the beginning of a love affair.   Since I didn't know anyone yet I went by myself and sat at the bar. The staff was friendly and so were the patrons. Some of the patrons turned out to be a little too friendly, and the bartender, Jennifer, insisted that the barback walk me to my car to ensure my safety. As if that wasn't enough to make a fan out of me, I found out they serve $2 Blue Moons all day Saturday and the food is awesome!  The burgers are great, and you can order them rare if you like. I also became addicted to their BBQ chicken sandwich. And the wings. They'll grill them instead of fry them for you which is a bonus. In fact I don't thing there is anything that I have tried and disliked here.  Thursday-Sunday night they usually have a pretty decent cover band. Usually classic rock or 80s stuff. They also have NTN and a ton of TVs if you're into sports.  I was so in love that when it came time to move from my apartment, I made sure my new house was within walking distance. Not that you'd need to walk, (since half the year it is hot as hell even at 2am I can see why you wouldn't want to walk) they offer a free ride program on the weekends where they'll pick you up and drop you off. That way you don't have to worry about Sheriff Joe and wearing pink undies at Tent City.  Wow, I kinda wanna move back now. CK's I miss you!!!

xRXq4R3FmyI_gIHtGLqdHQ.text: I have honestly never had a bad experience here.  The wings are the best...lil secret...request to have them put on the grill to make them a lil extra crispy!  The fries are so crispy, crunchy and hot!  Had the opportunity to enjoy the Bloody Mary bar where you fix up your own with all the fixins'.  You basically get a glass with your choice of poison and you fix it up with the juice, hot sauce, pickles, peppers, etc.  The servers are awesome!  Never have to wait for anything.  They are on top of it there.  It appears they enjoy their job and you can tell by their service.  Man wish I would've gotten up earlier and went and got me some honey bbq wings!!  Well let's see it's 230am now...9 hours from now I can have me some of those wings!!  Ok...go to sleep wake up and go eat wings! That's the agenda for tomorrow!  Price is moderate that's if you drink beer and the time of day you go because of specials.

TOKxZnyK6BGrf0q3WatcQw.text: I liked this place!  I got the special k Pulled pork, in spicy bbq sauce, with coleslaw and pepperjack cheese YUM  I thought it was delicious for bar food.  I'll definitely come back.... just seemed like a very chill sports bar  Yay!

eRoGAZWJVl7YjJY0PHinDw.text: As Debbie W said... "I wish I lived closer".  I tried the Hatch Burger, this spicy treat was perfect and smothered in cheese and hatch chili sauce. But the one thing that really made my night was the Chipotle Raspberry wings.  I thought I was in heaven eating them.  By the time the Hatch Burger arrived I was full so the burger didn't get the full attention it deserved.  I tried a taste of hubby's beer and well it was also very good, I just can't remember the name of it.  I have to say if I lived closer we would be there at least once a week for burgers.  Much better then where I usually end up.    Excellent job tonight!  You guys rocked it out of the park and I really enjoyed it.

PS9Ho5q-E6VzNuXmIi3dDA.text: The raspberry chipotle wings were fantastic. I ordered the patty burger which was good but not something to write home about - a sauce would have made it perfect! Service was great and every TV was tuned in to sports.

NcBPmKgiS0Xu8LaQBgQ6Xg.text: This is the first time my wife and i have been here and this is a  very nice place. Its more resturant than bar which was very nice. The burger was to die for. The Buffalo chips were amazing. My wife got the carne audovada and we got wings and everything was supurb. I can see why they were voted best of tukee. The service was top notch. We will be back!

T2BMPz7KgfqVzOXk-29nag.text: Great Sunday football atmosphere. The servers tending the bar are fantastic! After being away a year, the waitress remembered my name! Food is always good.

wEQr1byHB-lEzFpPx7x3XQ.text: If there's a better staff or an owner more in touch with their patrons than CK's I have yet to find them.  This is a classic sports bar where you're always treated like family.  My wife and I frequent numerous restaurants and bars in the east valley, and CK's is always where we feel most at home. You won't be disappointed when you visit here.   Support local, folks!!!

Cnd3VcX-vltyYy0P2HOUng.text: New to ahwatukee and figured it was time to find a local watering hole to spend my nights, so I popped in on Friday night to sample the food & service, and I left happy as  clam.  First, the staff were all super friendly and attentive to my needs, but not pushy and always around to interrupt my meal or the fact I was watching a game on the multiple flat screens available for viewing. Also, the band playing did a great job of keeping the evening lively, but since i was a first timer i sat at the bar, so I bet the folks near the band were having more fun with them.  The food, which was awesome for being a local tavern, had a lot of flavor and the portions were huge, which is always a welcome site. I had the jalapeno spinach dip (awesome) boneless hot wings (super tasty and a bit of fire)plus some chili cheese tots, which stole the show.   All around great experience and am certain this is my new go to spot for local eats and drinks.

SgCkE0oU-EzJ9BKcleyVfA.text: The mushroom and Swiss burger was very good. Perfectly cooked to order. The buffalo fries were half cooked properly and half turned into some sort of solid-state disk. Some of them must've been fresh cooked and some of must've been sitting around for quite some time. They were stone cold and hard as rocks.  They were not only old work they were obviously over Cooked from the color.  I have read a lot of the reviews and they range from very very good to very disappointing. I can understand why that might be, they obviously have trouble executing sometimes.

L6BIYWZhuOZUNKxBxyLk4Q.text: Be careful what you order from here.  I ordered the potato skins and asked for sour cream only instead of sour cream and the chipotle ranch sauce that comes with it. They charged me .50 extra for the other sour cream. When I asked to talk to a manager, his explanation was that sour cream is more expensive than the ranch sauce. BS! I realize it was only .50 but it's the principle.  I didn't get any more condiment than what I would have gotten if I wanted the ranch sauce so why charge me more? It'll be a long time before I return to this establishment, if ever, if this is how they treat their customers.

GP9dSrZidHzz4t4CjAvOug.text: We ordered a steak sandwich and the raspberry chipotle boneless wings everybody was raving about.  The steak in the sandwich had no flavor, I've had better steak at a chinese buffet.  The bread was kind of nasty..  almost stale but I think its just how it comes?  The tots were the thing we liked, but how do you screw that up.  The wings were shrivelled - kind of like chinese food in a way where they batter and fry up chicken pieces that are sliced thin and then cover with sauce.  The ends were dried up chicken and batter that were more like jerky than wings.  The sauce was creative, but definitely not the next ranch or honey mustard.  Maybe a little more of a spicy kick would make it better.  All in all, won't go back.  Mostly because we don't live in the area so the next time we're there, we'll try something else.  If it was in my neighborhood, I might go back for happy hour.  Their drinks looked pretty cheap and I wouldn't feel so bad about the wings if I'm paying half price and drunk.

Qq4Sd3nDYku3EwPr0svMdw.text: How is it possible I've never done a review for CK's yet?  I live right next to it and eat there like once a week and had a huge birthday bash there... whaaaaaat?   Wow... so anyways.. here's my review.  GO THERE :)  done.  Srsly tho... awesome food... the friday fish fry kicks ass and isn't expensive and you can choose between cod and perch.  The breakfast burritos and stuff are good and they have some pretty decent drink specials... only one I remember off hand is $2 Blue Moon pints all day Saturdays... yum!  The live bands are always good, two pool tables, bunch of flat panels everywhere you look, huge outdoor patio with misters and TV's again, and they even have some arcade games towards the back.  Staff... always friendly... never had one person in there be bitchy or short or anything... very nice crew they got working there.  I see a TON of regulars too meaning there's some good local culture in there.  Anyways... had no idea I've never done a review for them yet... sorry CK's! lol...   I'll see ya in there!

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. CK Tavern &amp; Grill Logo

RW--14t8BB7AjoVPNfKLrQ.text: Since my last review, I've been to this place several (maybe 20) more times. They have live music (with no cover) on Thursdays-Sundays, which has proven, without fail, to be very entertaining.   They also have free wifi so you can bring your laptop and get some work done while you eat. The place is generally very quiet on weekdays during lunch, so it's convenient to sit in a booth and actually get some work done.   Really can't think of a negative thing to say about CKs. Actually chose this as a venue to throw my boyfriend's birthday party on a Saturday night. Can't wait!

7n1qgZ1toDHV7uylHwjtoQ.text: I ate there with my husband on a Saturday and watched some college football.  It is a dive, but it has some nice tvs to watch multiple games on.  Standard sports bar atmosphere.  Our booth wasn't very clean, and the restaurant smelled kind of smokey.  Burgers were ordered medium and were well done, not even a little pink.  Food was ok.  It seems popular with a 50 something single crowd.  I probably would't go again personally.

ESSIWS0B0CHnQ6kRL7l2jQ.text: Went in midweek for lunch with a few guys from work. Place was quiet, easy to get seats. Staff were super friendly and efficient.  Some of the best wings I have ever had... Try the boneless wings, hot, and "Finished on the grill"... AWESOME!!! Also highly recommend the patty melt on marbled rye with sweet potato fries.

1XqsS_8s8UyyFdKYGU1s-Q.text: They have an awesome selection of beer. They have live bands on the weekends. The prices are great, and the raspberry chipotle wings are PHENOMENAL... Great place to watch a game with TV's everywhere. My kids even love going there.

5UKPmYIwfTlRnDXhsQ6AYQ.text: Great dive bar. Good service at the bar. Awesome specials. Regular bar food but it is what it is. And if your in the mood to kill time it's great!

wRpCoObasdPs9uUk0y6obg.text: I should probably have reviewed this alonggggg time ago.. because honestly, this place is my Cheers. Except...not.. really haha. I usually come here every day after work, unless I am really busy with school or something. The regulars that come here are awesome, same with the servers and bartenders..basically everything about this place is amazing...oh but of course, I can't forget about their rasberry chipotle wings and their hamburgers.. SOOOO GOOD.. just thinking about it is making me drool..attractive ;)  Oh by the way, they have amazing choices for whiskey and a day just for whiskey drinks! (Thursdayyy!) Another reason why I love this place :)

T4AJAFX_f-0CVXgUEdh2Gw.text: The owner wrote to me the day after my review - nothing like owners that pay attention to what their customers have to say.  We need a new category to rank owner/manager responsiveness - how about it Yelp?  I'm amazed at so many places that get Yelped and yet no one at the restaurant seems to read the reviews....what a waste of great customer feedback.

6aGCV4U8-lTQii2SK6VlYw.text: No wait at all... very cool people on the patio, and nice service.  The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because I wasn't blown away by the food; however, was decent bar good.   My wife and I will definitely be going back!

ps2Ls8o5dECi-gQOnjpDKw.text: Cheap beer, decent food, nice change of pace from all the chains around in the area. $2.75 Heineken, plus their buffalo fries and Guinness mussels are my favorite.

HAHwpniI2_0HY70lUzkcuw.text: Had a good experience. Good food and very nice servers. The French dip had plenty of meat and no fat or gristle.

g82rz9gtuaKcPVSLMjEy0g.text: This is a fun place to hang out at. They have great service and really good food! They also have a live band playing on Saturday nights.  It's a bar but also a family place, where you can grab a bite to eat with your family.

-F-ZtLUSy_s_-x78PGkGsg.text: I always love it when Erin is there, so tonight was awesome! Always get great service and the food is good.  I love the salads and the wings.

eaRDwz1kHS6UbT8J3fP7uw.text: We went here for an early lunch. The food was average- boneless wings were dry, burger was just ok.

p2S2uT2rNR3aPlRBVCXQ7Q.text: I had the Boneless Wings...grilled. I recommend getting them grilled.  Cold beer, great staff and lots of screens.  Sit at the bar when Brenda is working for a good time.

wP7MVLI77kWkuFOAe2k2HQ.text: I'm thinking this place gets the high reviews for their awesome drink specials... definitely not the food. The drinks are always a deal, and it must be popular on weekend... it was dead the night I went.. but at least l could get some bad wings and a few beers at midnight. Barkeep was very nice too.

yQfKMiqa8L_XzPICKh24Hg.text: I really want to like CK's ... And normally I do. I love the grilled wings and many items on their menu. The service is great however the lighting is low and dingy, plus the bathrooms are kinda gross. I came here for the Cardinals game figuring I'd support the local bar. I was disappointed that the sound was constantly switched back and forth between the Packers and the Cardinals game. At times they even had both game sounds overlapping each other. You'd figure the sound would be kept on the home team. I won't be coming here again during football season. The new Philly's on Warner has an amazing tv set up and always keeps the sound on the Cardinals game.

mi4kKbrS9OTl6N_LbgUWLw.text: Cks is by far the best hang out place in Awatukee.  They have a fantastic happy hour that always fills you up. Also I love the staff. I've been living on and off in tukee for the last 17 years and will always choose Cks.  Look if your like me you like a good soft pretzel. I make a point to order a pretzel at any place that serves them. Cks has the best in the valley.  Its huge, ridiculous, and delicious.  I love this place. Best restaurant in Tukee  to watch a game have a drink get some great food.

6nJyDaFXMFFoPynDfXhfTA.text: Right.  Solid.  Great sports bar.   They used to sponsor my buddies' softball team and so we would always go over there afterwards and drink.  They gave us so much free beer.  Pretty much went every Friday evening for a year.    Great wings, good food in general, tons of TVs, huge bar, huge outdoor patio and even a couple of pool tables.     The live music on Friday nights sometimes annoyed me.  Old people seem to be attracted to this dance floor and the music was just too loud to talk even if you are seated at the opposite end of the restaurant from the band.    Yes, I realize that is an ironic statement.    Whether you are going to watch a game, have some strawberry hot wings, get hammered, or just to dance with some old people on a Friday night, you can't go wrong with CKs.

XVEwMXyDxNYTJQzqtyD2JQ.text: Once again, CK's hits the mark!   Go for Happy Hour, and order the raspberry wings grilled..tasty! Also get the Southwestern  Dip and chip great with a tall Fat Tire! A nice atmosphere out on the patio...

KYEZlhdZNgr0FCwjblqIjg.text: I reviewed CK's a while back and I would like to say since then, their service has really come back up to par, their food is great and we are regular customers once again. I ordered take out tonight and they were super fast, the food was hot and great and I was so impressed that no less than 4 staff members either asked to assist me or told me thank you for coming, have a great evening. I'm so glad because I have always loved this neighborhood eatery

4PNEa2VGxML3DtThb0T-tQ.text: All around some of the best bar food in Phoenix.  The wings have gotten a bit smaller over the years but they have a great taste.  I recommended the grilled hot wings.

y3pQILKLEoN3pu5LxOLH9w.text: CKs is an excellent neighborhood bar and grill. Whether you want to watch the big game with some friends or just want to have a few drinks and some tasty, fresh food, CK's is the place to go. My favorite thing to eat here is the Bleu Burger with hatch green chili added. Pair that with some buffalo fries and a cold beer for a perfect meal. Go to CK's next time you have a hankering for a great time with some great food.

photos.caption: Photo of CK's Tavern & Grill - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Chipotle raspberry wings

uekVmm01WfEgLPhliJAcBw.text: Great local restaurant and bar!  Food was very good, reasonable prices, drink specials and wonderful brownie ice cream. Waitress was fantastic.  Even had a pool table and juke box!!!!!

Bs-LJS1afhHk0tEY96eCkA.text: Thanks CK'S for making hump day Wednesday evening, better, nice evening decide to sit on the Patio. Servers (syndey and sway) were friendly and attentive.  Once again chicken parm is perfect, there went the diet...Live entertainment was awesome (Juliel), and much appreciated bonus.  Raises for all!

_4qorQXpO4AEPxnS5lx_0w.text: Being new to yelp, it's unfortunate that my first review has to be so negative.   I brought my family into this establishment a few days ago. I must say that I was absolutely disgusted. This place was low class. My wings were way over cooked and dry, but I was not about to complain to someone in that place. The floors were dirty, the employees had scowls on their faces, we overheard one employee talking to another employee saying that she hates people as she stood at the hostess station, the lighting was terrible (dark and dingy) and the games stole my kids quarters!!!   The only positive experience we had was our waitress. She greeted us at our table and introduced herself. After we told her that this was our first visit there, she welcomed us and also told us as that she was new to the establishment as of a few weeks and also new to Arizona. She spoke highly of the place and the food and was cheerful and polite. We talked with her for roughly five minutes and had a very nice personable conversation. I asked her what she would recommend on the menu and she gladly gave us all recommendations on the food that she thought was good. After taking our order, the food was delivered by a male waiter. This person was extremely rude and when I asked for more ranch he grumbled and walked away. A few minutes later, our waitress showed up with the extra ranch and again was very attentive and polite. She asked us if we wanted anything else to drink and so I ordered another beer. I then overheard her asking this male waiter questions about the beer and he snapped back at her with a very rude comment. As she struggled with the ordering system at the hostess station, he and another waitress looked at her and just laughed and made fun of her. Instead of helping her, the young man began to belittle her. Once my beer came to the table, I asked her if there was a manager on duty that I could speak with and she pointed at that young man. I declined to talk with him when I found that out. I was completely turned off to find out that management in that place treats their employees like total dog crap!  Needless to say we all ate what we could of our food and left her a very nice tip! Her service was splendid, but I will never go back!!!!

A1xaVF9nUUQ9GNzCyMWXxg.text: Great food, friendly staff, reasonably priced, and they have great live music all the time.  You can't lose!

MrFyUyw-WKO4MjLigKlI4g.text: We frequent this place quite often as we enjoy the trivia games on t.v. and the general atmosphere is appealing. The chicken strips are always delicious and the fish fry on Friday night is a good deal. Be careful not to finish your fries and cole slaw too quickly though, unless you want to purchase more. The fish fry is an all you can eat deal but just for the fish, which can get a little boring after a while...pace yourself and it'll be fine!  Good beers, good service. Nice neighborhood spot.

_EcFWcwN_9RnS8_yDVtraA.text: I've been here on several occasions to watch sports with my boyfriend and whoever else is with us and so far this place still is just considered "A-OK" to me. The food really isn't all that great consistently. Last night we got some wings that we're small, barely had any meat on them and basically were bone dry. Their fries were really yummy and we also got a meatball sandwich which was good. Whenever I've gone its been a hit or miss with the food.   Also whenever we sit inside we get great service..outside however not so much. I think the waitress forgot about us the majority of the night.  I think overtime I could easily become more fond of this place, its always clean and the staff is friendly. Over all its a pretty good sports bar.

6Dm6GnvkSgoQ3rD0Dir1zg.text: Love this place. Friendly staff, good selection of beers, and buzztime trivia. Can't go wrong.

tH7OLrriv47hbHGDFICxNw.text: Probably my favorite wing & sports grill in Ahwatukee. Very nice staff and service. Very good value.

wI0w3uXcFDMdj3IRRM3OqA.text: We've been here a lot since our first visit. Unfortunately, I have to lower the star rating. While service is good, and we like the Friday and Saturday night bands playing, there are a few things that are starting to bother us about CKs.  The only food items we really enjoy are the fries, the wings, and the zucchini. We've tried different burgers, sandwiches, and a couple entrees and it's just boring and bland, or the portions are too small for what you're charged. The burgers are pretty good size but their sandwiches aren't and regardless of which you get they seem to gyp you on fries. Last night my sandwich came with 4 big fries and about 6 or 7 little skimpy fries. My boyfriend ordered the hatch chili burger which we were told was an open-faced burger. While that's fine, they didn't give him the top bun. Generally an open-faced sandwich means both the top and bottom pieces of bread are laid on the plate and all the other messy ingredients are poured over top and you eat it with a fork and knife. CKs only gave him the bottom bun. When I looked over and saw that he had barely eaten half of it and I knew he didn't like it. This man tears through a good burger. He said it was really bland. It honestly didn't look appetizing at all. He was also gyped on fries. We've noticed this happens every time we order burgers or sandwiches. The same seems to be happening with their appetizers. The first few times we came here we would always order the zucchini and the wings. They used to fill the $8 basket of zucchini up, now it's barely enough for us to share. The zucchini is so freaking good but it's no where near worth $8 or ordering it anymore.  Lastly we're getting a little tired of waiting for the bands to play at 9:30pm. We really enjoy the music but with our very early work schedules we're used to going to bed quite early so on weekends we're ready for bed by 9:30pm. Lame for us, I know, but there are many other bars or restaurants where the music starts at 8pm or even 7pm. Also, their website isn't accurate anymore on who's playing. We went last night because the website said Broken Toys was playing and we really enjoyed them last time. However it was a different band who never introduced themselves and who weren't as good. Sad...  While we still like CKs, we most likely would eat dinner else where and just come for a couple drinks and some music...if we're willing to stay up.

1Txp-EYCLSNrg5CVGDGkgg.text: I've been a Ahwatukee local since 1999. CKs is a cool place to hear music.  I don't like the vodka they use as their house vodka,  it's always bitter.  So this is not my choice to go.  I had a coupon and went back on Good Friday for their all you can eat Fish Fry.  The breading had no flavor what so ever.  I gave 2 stars because the service is always good, I wish the owners/managers would taste the dishes that their cooks put out,  and add some creative flavor to their fish fry.
